/usr/bin/g++-7    -shared -Wl,-soname,libBox.so -o libBox.so CMakeFiles/Box.dir/Modbus/BaseModbus.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Box.dir/Modbus/ModbusMaster.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Box.dir/ElectricityBox/EleBoxHAL.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Box.dir/ElectricityBox/EleBoxSimulation.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Box.dir/ElectricityBox/EleBoxV2.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Box.dir/ElectricityBox/EleBoxV4.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Box.dir/ElectricityBox/EleBoxFactory.cpp.o -lmodbus
